# What is your DevSecOps Automation in CI/CD project?

Learn to use Appdome as a DevSecOps automation platform in your mobile CI/CD. Gain DevOps class, speed, visibility, management, and control over the build-to-release process for mobile app security, anti-fraud and other defense features. Fully automate the build, certify, release, and monitoring of mobile app security, anti-fraud and other defense features in Android & iOS apps in the CI/CD pipeline. This section covers the basics of configuring Appdome, creating mobile app protection templates, using individual and team workspaces, automating code signing as well as Appdome's DEV-APIs and prebuilt integrations with CI/CD systems. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact [support.appdome.com](https://support.appdome.com/)

[### Certified Secure™ DevSecOps Certification >

Learn to use **Certified Secure™ DevSecOps Certification** in Appdome’s DevSecOps automation platform to accelerate mobile DevSecOps. Certified secure is a fully automated, in-line, record of the mobile app security, anti-fraud, anti-malware, mobile anti-bot and other mobile app defenses built in Android & iOS apps your DevOps CI/CD pipeline. Each Certified Secure certificate is the artifact of proof of the cyber, anti-fraud and other defenses are in each app. Use the certificate as a DevSecOps compliance tool to clear Android & iOS releases fast, close the loop on DAST/SAST vulnerability scans, and gain visibility and control over the protection model(s) released to production in mobile apps.

[### Automated Signing of Secured Mobile Apps >

Learn to use the **Automated Signing of Secured Mobile Apps** in Appdome’s DevSecOps automation platform for faster DevSecOps. Automated code signing of secured Android & iOS apps helps mobile developers avoid code signing errors, perform signing validation, and eliminating false positive anti-tampering defenses in the DevSecOps pipeline. Appdome offers three options for automated signing of secured mobile apps, including (1) sign on Appdome, (2) private signing (for Appdome sealed apps), and (3) automated code signing for Android & iOS apps in DevOps CI/CD. All app singing includes hardened v2 and v3 signing schemes and tamper proof app signing and sealing for Android & iOS apps.
